categories.name: Non-Ferrous Metals
categories.description: High-grade aluminum, copper, brass, and bronze products for industrial applications

categories.name: Ferrous Metals
categories.description: Premium steel, iron, and alloy metals for construction and manufacturing

categories.name: Machinery
categories.description: Industrial machinery and equipment for various sectors

categories.name: Animal Feed
categories.description: Quality feed products for livestock and poultry

products.name: Aluminum Sheet 6061-T6
products.shortDescription: Premium aluminum alloy sheet with excellent corrosion resistance
products.description: 6061-T6 aluminum sheet is one of the most versatile heat-treatable aluminum alloys. It offers excellent mechanical properties and exhibits good weldability. Widely used in aerospace, marine, and structural applications.

products.name: Copper Rod C11000
products.shortDescription: High-conductivity copper rods for electrical applications
products.description: C11000 electrolytic tough pitch copper rods with 99.9% purity. Ideal for electrical conductors, bus bars, and various industrial applications requiring high thermal and electrical conductivity.

products.name: Mild Steel Round Bar
products.shortDescription: Versatile mild steel bars for construction and fabrication
products.description: High-quality mild steel round bars with excellent machinability and weldability. Suitable for a wide range of construction, engineering, and manufacturing applications.

products.name: Stainless Steel Sheet 304
products.shortDescription: Corrosion-resistant stainless steel for demanding environments
products.description: Grade 304 stainless steel sheets offering excellent corrosion resistance, formability, and weldability. The most widely used stainless steel grade for food processing, chemical, and architectural applications.

products.name: Industrial Lathe Machine CNC-2000
products.shortDescription: Precision CNC lathe for high-volume production
products.description: Heavy-duty CNC lathe machine designed for precision machining operations. Features advanced control systems, high rigidity, and excellent repeatability for demanding manufacturing environments.

products.name: MIG Welding Machine 400A
products.shortDescription: Professional MIG welding equipment for heavy-duty applications
products.description: Industrial-grade MIG welding machine with advanced inverter technology. Provides stable arc performance, excellent weld quality, and energy efficiency for various metal fabrication tasks.

products.name: Industrial Hammer Drill Pro-HD850
products.shortDescription: Heavy-duty hammer drill for concrete and masonry work
products.description: Professional-grade rotary hammer drill designed for intensive drilling in concrete, brick, and stone. Features powerful motor, anti-vibration system, and durable construction for demanding job sites.

products.name: Professional Socket Wrench Set 120pc
products.shortDescription: Comprehensive socket set for maintenance and repair
products.description: Complete 120-piece socket wrench set manufactured from chrome vanadium steel. Includes a wide range of sockets, ratchets, extensions, and accessories for professional automotive and industrial maintenance.

products.name: Premium Poultry Layer Feed
products.shortDescription: Balanced nutrition for optimal egg production
products.description: High-quality layer feed formulated to support peak egg production and shell quality. Contains optimal protein levels, calcium, vitamins, and minerals for healthy laying hens.

products.name: Dairy Cattle Concentrate Feed
products.shortDescription: High-energy feed for dairy cattle productivity
products.description: Specially formulated concentrate feed designed to maximize milk production in dairy cattle. Rich in protein, energy, and essential nutrients to support lactation and overall health.
